duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with immigration attorneys and regional managers on immigration cases and client matters.
Preparation and review of Immigrant Visa Petition packages and submissions.
Experience with VAWA U Visa / Self-Petition and DOJ EOIR Applications for Relief.
Proficiency in managing immigration inquiries, gathering required information, and keeping clients informed of progress.
Exceptional record-keeping, communication, and customer service skills.

education_certification.credential: AILA Paralegal Certification (preferred, or willing to obtain within the first year of employment)
